original_text: Now there were with us seven brethren: and the first, when he had married a wife, deceased, and, having no issue, left his wife unto his brother:
korean_text: 우리 중에 칠 형제가 있었는데 맏이가 장가 들었다가 죽어 상속자가 없으므로 그 아내를 그 동생에게 물려 주고

sentences.original_text: Now there were with us seven brethren:
and the first, when he had married a wife,
left his wife unto his brother:
